events.message: I received the smartphone I ordered last week, but the screen has several scratches and appears to be faulty. Please advise how this can be resolved.
The customer's report indicates a product defect, mentioning scratches and a faulty screen on the device received.
Assigning the case to the product support specialist team for handling the defective smartphone issue.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. I'm sorry to hear your phone arrived with scratches and issues. I'll be happy to help get this sorted out.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and any other damage, as well as your order number to verify your purchase details?
Here are the photos showing the scratches on the screen and the order number is 123456789. Let me know if you need any other info.
Thank you for the information and photos. We can offer you a replacement device shipped at no extra cost or a full refund if you prefer.
I would like a replacement, please. The phone is new and I want one without any damage. Thank you for the quick help.
Your replacement order has been processed and will be shipped within 2 business days. We will send you tracking details soon.
Just checking in to confirm you received your replacement smartphone and that it arrived in perfect condition. Let us know if you need further assistance.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and it is flawless. Thanks for your support and quick resolution.
We are glad everything is sorted out. Closing the case now. Feel free to contact us anytime for future support.
